string.text: Living Legend: Old Friend
Doctor, Strelok's old companion, has retired to the north-west corner of the Great Swamps. Find a way to reach him to continue your search for Strelok.
Living Legend: Underground Hideout
Doctor suggested visiting Strelok's hideout in Agroprom Underground for clues on his whereabouts.
A thorough read of Doctor's notes reveals Strelok's got a hideout in Agroprom Underground. Visit it for clues on his whereabouts.
Strelok's notebook

This notebook used to belong to Strelok. A quick read reveals many rather disjointed and cryptic notes. Seems the stalker had a crisis about an important decision he had made a few years ago, and wanted to quickly resupply at Rostok before pushing north to verify his choices.
Living Legend: Following the Trail
If Strelok wanted to resupply at Rostok, Barkeep probably knows something about it. Pay him a visit.
Living Legend: Following the Trail
Aslan is knowledgeable about the Zone's north. Pay him a visit.
Living Legend: Call of the North
Obtain a functional psychic device to protect you from the Brain Scorcher.
Gatekeeper is a veteran who defends the Barrier. He's likely the last person who's seen Strelok's group.
Living Legend: Breakthrough
The Monolith are invading the Barrier. You have to defeat them in order to access Radar.
You've repelled the Monolith assault. Talk to Gatekeeper.
Living Legend: Over the Rainbow
Disable the Brain Scorcher in order to access the heart of the Zone.
Living Legend: The Enclave
Gatekeeper sends his regards to Beard. The latter might know something about Strelok.
Living Legend: Meet Rogue
One of Strelok's group, Rogue, is currently in Skadovsk. Talk with him to find out more.
Living Legend: Experimental Weapon
Rogue wants you to find an experimental weapon for him. Visit an abandoned military installation.
You have found the experimental weapon. Return to Rogue.
"Item ¹62"

Extremely powerful and highly accurate electromagnetic accelerator gun. Obtains energy from electric-type artefacts. Can penetrate even the best armour. Someone apparently abandoned this hand-held version on the shooting range of its much bigger prototype.
Living Legend: Path to Pripyat
Pass through the Jupiter Underground. Rogue will accompany you.
You have defeated a Monolith ambush. Consult Rogue about the situation.
Reach Strelok's hideout in Pripyat. Rogue will accompany you.
Living Legend: Medical Supplies
Stitch, Strelok's combat medic, has asked you to procure %s.
Living Legend: Attack on Titan
A dangerous pseudogiant roams Pripyat. Kill it in advance to avoid a lethal distraction.
You have defeated the pseudogiant. Return to Rogue to inform him about your success.
Living Legend: Top Secret
Lab X-8 contains top secret information on the Zone. Find the documents and bring them to Strelok.
X-8 documents

These documents briefly touch on the results of extensive experiments in psy-research conducted by an unknown group. Most notably, the results seem to confirm the existence of a non-contact field of psychic energy which envelops the Earth.
 
Also contained is the brief description of sophisticated machinery that could potentially influence said field in a controlled fashion.
 
The bulk of these documents, however, are simply a long list of human test subjects who were exposed to psy-emissions of various frequencies and intensities. Many were noted to have seemingly developed superhuman endurance, intellect or telepathic abilities during the testing. Some are recorded to have later died, others were transferred, and many were left completely unaccounted for, as if they disappeared or escaped.
 
Scribbled along one of the margins is a cryptic note: "Already we have perverted the human form far beyond recognition for the sake of our vision! How much longer will it be before our hubris and sin catches up to us?". Strelok will definitely be interested in this.
Living Legend: First Strike
Assemble the team and set out to defeat Eidolon.
Living Legend: Champion of the Monolith
Raid the Palace of Culture to lure Eidolon out, and defeat him.
Living Legend: Ambitious Objective
You've defeated Eidolon. Now's the time for Strelok to reveal his main objective.
Living Legend: CNPP Raid
Reach the CNPP and defeat the defending Monolith forces.
Living Legend: Crucible
Fight your way to the Monolith Control Centre, defeat the Phantom Guard and find the Shard of the Monolith.
Shard of the Monolith

This object was, according to legend, split from the Wish Granter itself. Displays properties not unlike an artefact. It crackles with unnerving energy, and may boast insidious powers that aren't immediately apparent.
Living Legend: Answers
You have obtained a shard of the Monolith. The time for answers has come.
Strelok's pendrive

This pendrive contains plenty of encrypted data: the backup copy of Strelok's many findings throughout the years. Invaluable piece of evidence regarding the top secret experiments that allegedly created the Zone.
Living Legend: Finish
Return to Cold to report your success.
Return to Sidorovich to report your success.
Return to Dushman to report your success.
Return to Lukash to report your success.
Return to General Voronin to report your success.
Return to Professor Sakharov to report your success.
